avg_usage.comment: Usage time of a function or event. unit is ms

max_usage.comment: Max usage time of a function or event. unit is ms

min_usage.comment: Min usage time of a function or event. unit is ms

alignment.comment: 阵营: LG守序善良 NG中立善良 CG混乱善良 LN守序中立 TN绝对中立 CN混乱中立 LE守序邪恶 NE中立邪恶 CE混乱邪恶

extra_data.comment: 额外信息，如图片的信息之类的

members_count.comment: 一个反范式操作，用于方便的获取用户数

disable_check_actor.comment: 是否禁止查看人物卡, 用于秘密团

target_uuid.comment: 根据类型指向不同的模型的UUID

user_tags.comment: user tags when send notify use. if not use any user tag to send, keep it null

download_url.comment: 二进制文件完整下载地址
